enterprise_cloud_database_create_descrip: Enterprise Cloud Database is a fully managed, high performance database cluster service. Using Enterprise Cloud Database is a powerful alternative to installing, configuring, maintaining, and securing database by hand. Clusters include daily backups with point-in-time recovery (PITR), standby nodes for high availability, and end-to-end SSL encryption.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_choose_: A database cluster runs a single database engine that powers one or more individual databases.
Generally, choose the region where your application Droplets are located. If the database cluster is located in a different region, added latency may slow performance.
You will be able to add, remove, or resize nodes at any time after the cluster is created.
{{ numDefaultNodes }} dedicated nodes are included by default
enterprise_cloud_database_create_additio: You will be able to add, remove, or resize Replicas at any time after the cluster is created. 1 Replica is included by default.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_choose_: More the commitment more the savings.
Pay at once to save more.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_storage: {{ storage }} GB {{ storageType }} X {{ storageCount }} storages
enterprise_cloud_database_create_save: Save {{ amount }}{{ currencySymbol }} on this commitment
enterprise_cloud_database_create_save_fi: Save total of {{ amount }}{{ currencySymbol }} with this payment type
enterprise_cloud_database_create_order_s: {{ ram }} GB RAM, {{ cpu }} Cores, {{ storage }} GB {{ storageType }} X {{ storageCount }} storage
